price: A i ovi ne čekaju do jedan zvuk roga koji neće biti potrebno ponoviti.
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
